3.name: User Force limit
3.description: Limit the user"s privilege to force a payment in insufficient funds scenario (according to the payment amount)

4.name: User Max amount
4.description: Limit the maximum payment amount that the user is authorized to handle

5.name: User Status
5.description: View the user"s status and update it

6.name: User Password change
6.description: Request to change a user"s password

8.name: Access class
8.description: To grant the user access to only specific functions and operations (menu options and commands)

9.name: Departments class
9.description: To grant the user access to specific departments

10.name: Message types class
10.description: To grant the user permission to handle specific message types

11.name: Statuses and Filters class
11.description: To grant user access only to messages in a specific statuses and queues

12.name: Rule type class
12.description: To grant a user access to create and handle specific rule types

14.name: Amount Limits class
14.description: Restrict the user"s ability to handle message which exceed a specific amount, in a specific status

15.name: User absence
15.description: Indicate user absence for periods of illness, vacation, or other
